text: Jerry G. Rook (October 27, 1943 â€“ August 25, 2019) was an American basketball player. He was best known for his success at Arkansas State University. He was born in Jonesboro, Arkansas. He played for the Arkansas State Indians and the New Orleans Buccaneers. Rook died on August 25, 2019 in Jonesboro after a long-illness at the age of 75.Arkansas State & NEA basketball legend Jerry Rook passes away ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American basketball players Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:People from Jonesboro, Arkansas Category:Sportspeople from Arkansas
title: Jerry Rook
